DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study assess level medication adherence observe among subject receive specific combination education support material ( YourWay plan ) along prescription fesoterodine .
DOC.brief_title: This Is An Open-Label Study To Evaluate Fesoterodine Plus `` Your Way '' Patient Support Plan In Patients With Symptoms Of Overactive Bladder
DOC.detailed_description: This non-interventional , observational study . Study investigator recruit symptomatic , fesoterodine-naïve subject present OAB symptom regularly-scheduled physician visit fesoterodine-naïve subject OAB symptom present regularly-scheduled physician visit
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient > =18 year old Eligible receive Toviaz 4mg 8mg QD treatment base approve US label . Female subject pregnant , lactating , intend become pregnant within 28 day completion study ( use contraceptive require participate study ) Have participate study involve study drug within 30 day prior entry study Subjects previously take fesoterodine .
DOC.keyword: Overactive Bladder Incontinence Adherence Behavioral intervention
